de.sander.til

Class PrimeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sander.til.PrimeModel

  • public class PrimeModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the state of a PrimeView

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PrimeModel.InfoEntry 
      static class  PrimeModel.PMMode
      a enumeration of control modes (+/-)
      static class  PrimeModel.PMView
      A enumeration of view modes (keys: up/down/left/right).
